messages.message:
Hi all, not sure who to direct this to (@Heymian maybe?) - answering an RFP (lucky me) and they asked:

Does your company lodge the proposed software/solution source code with an Escrow agent? If yes please advise who the agent is and that DB can be added to your agreement at no additional cost to DB
wow do people do this? why would anyone store their source code with an escrow agent? :exploding_head: no we do not do this.

Most software companies do store their code with an escrow agent - this protects the customer using the code in case IB becomes insolvent the customer is not stuck without any means to continue building out the platform
ah TIL! i looked this up and sounds like this is more common with b2b?
